    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4855</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">2D Painting Overview</string>
            <string language="es">Visión general de pintura 2D</string>
            <string language="ga">Forbhreathnú Péinteála 2T</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">2D Anstrich-Überblick</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">2D Vue d'ensemble de Peinture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">2D Vista geral Da Pintura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">2D Descrizione Della Pittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">2D επισκόπηση ζωγραφικής</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Description of how to approach the painting section of the JC Art project with a finished sample project to view.</string>
            <string language="es">Descripción de la forma para afrontar esta sección del proyecto de arte JC con una muestra terminada del proyecto para ver.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur síos ar an gcaoi le tabhairt faoin mhír péinteála de thionscadal ealaíne an Teastais Shóisearaigh le sampla de thionscadal críochnaithe le breathnú air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Art</string>
            <string language="es">Arte</string>
            <string language="ga">Ealaíon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung von, wie man dem Anstrichkapitel des 
JC kunstprojektes mit einem fertigen Beispielprojekt zur Ansicht 
nähert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description de la façon approcher la section de 
peinture du projet d'art de JC avec un projet terminé d'échantillon 
à la vue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição de como aproximar a seção da pintura
do projeto da arte de JC com um projeto terminado da amostra à vista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione di come avvicinarsi alla sezione della
pittura del progetto di arte di JC con un progetto rifinito del 
campione alla vista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή για το πώς να πλησιάσει το τμήμα ζωγραφικής
του προγράμματος τέχνης JC με ένα τελειωμένο πρόγραμμα 
δειγμάτων για να εμφανίσει.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
